prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Bass, Reed, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
No Piano is present in this song, but Drums, Guitar, Bass, and Reed are all featured.

Style 2:
This composition features Drums, Guitar, Bass, and Reed, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
The instruments in this song are Drums, Guitar, Bass, and Reed, with no Piano.
